thread.title: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'Glass Castle'
thread.title_full: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'Glass Castle' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'Glass Castle'
text:
Actress Brie Larson is in early negotiations to replace Jennifer Lawrence in Lionsgate's "The Glass Castle".
READ: Jennifer Lawrence felt numb on 'Mockingjay' shoot
If the deal works, the 26-year-old Trainwreck actress will get a chance to work again with her critically acclaimed indie drama Short Term 12 , director Destin Daniel Cretton, reported The Wrap.
Jennifer Lawrence was had signed on to the project in late 2013 to both star in it and produce it.
An adaptation of Jeannette Walls' best-selling memoir, The Glass Castle is about a young girl who comes of age in a dysfunctional family led by a mother and father who attempt to divert the children from poverty.
